content:
Now that the call for proposals is out: are we still up for a mCode (and things) track?
@May Terry @Patrick Werner
Oh, and of course @Halina Labikova

Hi @Stefan Lang - Some of these discussions on the track use cases are underway and we hope to fill out the track template in the next week or two (before the deadline on July 31). With that, mCODE (at least for the September 2019 ballot) has aligned with US centric profiles (either Argonaut or US Core as preference). Would that still be okay with you and @Patrick Werner and @Halina Labikova ? I'm sure we would consider international support at some point, but unfortunately not for this September.

There is now an mCODE Connectathon Track proposal for this coming September: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2019-09+mCODE+Cancer+Interoperability+Track . Please post or contact me directly if you're interested in participating! Feedback on improving the track content is also welcome.

The mCODE Connectathon Track page (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2019-09+mCODE+Cancer+Interoperability+Track) has been updated with activity track content as well as an "mCODE Track Starter Guide". The guide contains the HSPC endpoints, example REST queries for example data, and an appendix on installing and using Postman for those who are unfamiliar with FHIR search parameters and operations. mCODE_FHIRConnectathonStarterGuide.docx
Looking forward to meeting all of the mCODE participants tomorrow morning!
Connectathon underway! Please post questions or make comments here. :-)
Attached is a revised version of the mCODE Connectathon Starter guide which has a fix to summary REST call #3. Thanks @Chris Moesel for finding the bug. :-) mCODE_FHIRConnectathonStarterGuidev01.docx
is this track creating any AuditEvent or Provenance records? I am working on an app that consumes AuditEvent and would like to find some.
Hi @John Moehrke -- sorry, but I don't think anyone in our track has produced any AuditEvent or Provenance records (at least not for this track).
our mCODE Track Issues and Group notes are available here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2019-09+mCODE+Track+Issues+and+Group+Notes .
